author: Amanda Ferguson
title: Coronavirus: Sweeping powers with fines of up to £5,000 come into force in North
description: Restrctions on movement after after 15th death and another 49 positive tests recorded
content:
Sweeping powers to restrict the movement of people to help curb the spread of coronavirus in Northern Ireland have come into force in Northern Ireland.
In a statement issued on Saturday night, the Stormont Executive said it had agreed to adopt the powers in … [+5324 chars]
